document_data.name: Bremen's Runs
document_data.mainbody: '''Bremen's Runs''' was a colorfully named alcoholic drink brewed in the [[Ten-Towns]] of [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Availability: The libation was sold as early as the {{YearlinkName|1312}}, in the city of [[Bremen]]. The drink was also served at [[The Salty Dog]] tavern in [[Targos]] where it was the cheapest intoxicant available. Sold for a single [[gold]] piece at the bar by its portly proprietor [[Gohar]] who was happy to share the town's latest rumors with paying customers.
